Test Name: Coagulation Factor II (Prothrombin) Activity Assay, Plasma
Purpose: To accurately determine Factor II (Prothrombin) activity levels in plasma samples to aid in diagnosing and monitoring coagulation disorders.
Container: 3.2% sodium citrate tube (9:1 blood to anticoagulant ratio)
Equipment: Coagulation analyzer (e.g., Siemens BCS XP, Sysmex CS-2500)
